translation: Good men and good women who live in the bodhisattva vehicle hear the name of this jeweled parasol of the supreme buddha, Worthy of Offerings, Perfectly Enlightened One.

translation: Those who are able to praise, remember, and memorize it will be born in a different existence and attain knowledge of past lives. They won’t be born among inferior clans or among the poor.

translation: Where they are born, there is no obstruction by the mother and no obstruction by the father. There is no obstruction by wealth and no obstruction by illness.

translation: If there are good men and good women living in the bodhisattva vehicle who hear my name and can call it by name and memorize it, that person will be born from generation to generation and always leave home.

translation: Having renounced the householder’s life, they attain to one thousand concentrations. In each concentration they further realize a hundred thousand kūṭis of all kinds of concentrations.

source_sentence: 彼之所得諸三摩地永不散失。
translation: The samādhis they attain are never scattered or lost.

translation: Having entered nirvana one thousand times in the past, he venerates and listens to the Dharma with these ten thousand buddhas. The same applies to all those who see buddhas and hear the Dharma in present and future ages.

translation: Good men and good women, if they can recite the names of those buddhas, that person’s holy appearance of Buddhahood will appear before them while listening to the Dharma.

translation: If they had never heard such teachings before, and studied them accordingly, they would immediately attain boundless hundreds of thousands of myriads of koṭis of evolving mental commands.

source_sentence: 又此閻浮提中，一切有情隨所樂求而悉能知，然後如其信解善為說法，
translation: “Furthermore, all sentient beings in this world are able to know and teach the Dharma appropriately according to their inclinations.

source_sentence: 當得不退轉於阿耨多羅三藐三菩提，阿僧祇俱胝那庾多百千劫中背於生死，
